title: Mr. Coffee® Tea Maker and Kettle
description:
A must-have for tea lovers who enjoy the ultimate at-home steeping experience using loose tea leaves or tea bags!
This Mr. Coffee® Tea Maker + Kettle creates delicious, custom flavor tea infusions with exactness of taste, depending on the type of tea.  As a kettle you can boil water to create instant beverages and meals.
